dishes.name: Chai Tea Latte
dishes.discription: A little sweet, a little spicy … our Chai Tea Latte highlights the dynamic flavors of India in every perfectly brewed Cup. Steamed milk is combined with black tea embellished with a dynamic blend of sweet and spice for a full-flavor treat.

dishes.name: Ham and Swiss Egg Sandwich
dishes.discription: If you're looking for the ideal savory combination to crown your bagel of choice, look no further than our Ham & Swiss Classic Breakfast Sandwich! This protein-packed meal has it all - a cage-free egg, stick-to-your-ribs sliced ham and melted Swiss cheese.

dishes.name: Farmhouse Sandwich
dishes.discription: Grab your pitchfork and dig in to this inspired-by-the farm breakfast combo. Our Farmhouse Signature Breakfast Sandwich starts with cage-free eggs, thick-cut bacon, smoked ham and cheddar cheese, then gets a back-to-the-farm finish with country pepper shmear on a Cheesy Hash Brown Gourmet Bagel

dishes.name: Santa Fe Wrap
dishes.discription: Spice up your breakfast with a healthy twist with our Santa Fe Egg White Breakfast Sandwich. Our Asiago Cheese Bagel is topped with turkey sausage, fresh egg whites, spicy pepper jack cheese, and our Jalapeño Salsa Reduced Fat Shmear. It's the kick you need in the morning.

dishes.name: Spinach, Mushroom & Swiss
dishes.discription: Our Spinach, Mushroom & Swiss Classic Breakfast Sandwich is basically quiche you can carry! Your bagel of choice is topped with a cage-free egg, savory mushrooms, bright green spinach and classic, melt-in-your-mouth (and on-your-bagel) Swiss cheese.

dishes.name: Nova Lox Bagel
dishes.discription: Breakfast really doesn't get more perfect - or classic - than this! Top your favorite bagel with a bit of shmear, some crunchy red onion, a few savory capers, slices of bright, fresh tomato and our mild, luscious and cold-smoked Nova Lox salmon.
